summary: Simon, re: Flash asking 'how many memories are we going to have to restore'
mainText:
'yes'

((Flash's image is of a Hytale screenshot, showing an Unknown Item with the description 'Find the Forgotten Temple and restore 100 Memories to unlock this recipe!'))

summary: Slikey thinks about Bob Ross
mainText: 'I wonder if we will see a Bob Ross of Hytale builds.. The possibilities for creative builders are extensive and I am looking forward to watching relaxing building videos while we make the game good. ðŸ¤©'

summary: Slikey, re: server manual
mainText: 'Let me post the server manual on Sunday. I think I left everyone waiting enough now and it should answer your questions :)'

summary: Slikey, re: launcher issues
mainText: 'Please uninstall the launcher and reinstall it. Ensure that you are not getting a cached file from your browser. This issue was fixed but requires a manual reinstallation.'

summary: Slikey, re: launcher updates
mainText: 'We had to fix some issues and continue fixing issues in the future. Launcher patches may come at irregular intervals but will slow down over time. Just wait for how much we will have to patch the game in the first few weeks.. ðŸ˜­'

summary: Simon, re: Hytale's Early Access
mainText: 'We are almost home.'

summary: Thomas, re: user asking if they can use Hytale to create games and submit to gamejams
mainText: 'To clarify, Hytale is a moddable game more than a proper engine. Which means your players need to own Hytale to play your game.Yes it is a barrier to entry which unity/unreal don't have. But you can totally come to a game jam, make a Hytale game mod, and submit it/present it.  ðŸ™‚'

summary: Simon, re: possibility of skipping nights
mainText: 'yes'

summary: Paris, re: user fearing Hytale might consume their life
mainText: 'same'

summary: Simon, re: Myne saying the lantern pet mod video might be the best gameplay video of Hytale
mainText: 'this is where the creatives will shine'

summary: Simon, re: fast travel
mainText:
'Im not a Â« big Â» fan of fast travel, but it was a necessity given the state of the game until we have proper features to compensate and push it a bit further in the gameloop.

I think its also important to create a sense of Â« village/home Â» so having ways to return home is critical to push players much further away from home'

summary: Paris, re: Acorn joking NoCube spoiled the essence of life
mainText: 'oops'

summary: Simon, re: Prowl making a statement on teleportation in Hytale
mainText:
'I would like for people to play the game before making up their minds about this decision and making suggestions! There is a reason it was added: we played the game many times and noticed major issues caused by the lack of transportation. 

It plays differently from other block games, and it's still in very early access, so it's missing many travel features.'

summary: Simon, re: Prowl and Chayzur writing document for traveling methods
mainText: 'Perfect, will be watching and listening to feedback!'

summary: Oscar, re: Myne's 'wake up babe, new Hytale tweet' meme
mainText: 'You gotta make one that says "wake up babe, Hytale release" for Tuesday'

summary: DSN, re: user saying the team should explain how to install on Linux
mainText: 'Weâ€™re looking at adding this and will have support articles with instructions added as well'

summary: Simon, re: hot air balloons at launch
mainText: 'nope'

summary: Simon, re: hooks not being at launch
mainText: 'Not enough time, it required proper implementation into main branch and was acting up, will add after launch'

summary: DSN, re: Hytale being unplayable
mainText: 'Still true'

summary: Simon, re: hookshot, glider being in the game at launch
mainText: 'Hook no. Glider is currently disabled in crafting because it's a super bad experience (available in creative, though). A patch coming after launch will enable it with "ok" configs. I tried to do a late-night fix on it, but I had too much going on and ended up just delaying it.'

summary: DSN, re: being logged out of the launcher before release
mainText: 'If you invalidate sessions on the account website it would, so long as you donâ€™t do that youâ€™re all set'

summary: Simon, re: grid crafting
mainText: 'We have no plans to ever include grid crafting, as it would go against the game's entire design!'

summary: DSN, re: stress testing today
mainText:
'Thank you to everyone who participated and helped stress our systems before launch with Hytales launcher release. 

We got a lot of great data and are busy making adjustments to make Tuesdays launch as smooth as possible. 

If you havenâ€™t already check out http://accounts.hytale.com/download to get logged in and be ready for launch!'

summary: Simon, re: user being a fan of Waystone mod in MC
mainText: 'Yeah, we made simple teleporters (they need to be connected + are limited) for now. We wanted to do waypoints at some point too, but we ran out of time to do it properly.'

summary: Zero, re: Zeusley saying 'Ok?'
mainText: 'Ok!'
